------------------------------------------------Disco Return-----------------------------------------

Hello Dancer!!

Your mission is to get to the Disco to dance and have fun, but in your way you will find lots of different cops, spikes and much more!. You also need to get all the Disco Balls around the levels, and the secret DVD´s... Good Luck and have fun!!
